lines.text: You know, I used to live in this place where the phone man was always coming around.
Oh, I thought that you meant that you'd had a lot of phone trouble.
Hell, I didn't even have a phone!
Up the airy mountain, down the rushy glen, we dare not go a hunting, for fear of little men!
Do you get out much, Mrs. Callingham?
You're the one who needs to get out!
You're all alike. Danny... Jaffee... ALL of you! HYPOCRITES! And you, trying to be so damn pure. Get out! GET OUT!
My name is... Oliver... W... Cameron. Juror's consult. Abjudicator of the court of appeals. Doctor of jurisprudence.
You're upset, Allyson. I, I think you'd better go to your room. I'll, I'll get you something to help you sleep.
No. I'm not going anywhere. You're not going to touch me. We know all about that sleep. Your little doctor bit's over. Yeah, that's right. I told Miss Beale. She knows.

What does she know? Does she know how I worked? How I trained? To be the best? And I could have been. Except for one, insignificant life. One mistake. I could have saved thousands. And I will. I'll help everyone. I'll help you, Allyson.
